description: Aspirin, also known as acetylsalicylic acid, is a medication used to reduce pain, fever, and/or inflammation.
name: Aspirin

description: Budesonide, sold under the brand name Pulmicort among others, is a medication of the corticosteroid type.
name: Budesonide

description: Dutasteride, sold under the brand name Avodart among others, is a medication primarily used to treat the symptoms of an enlarged prostate
name: Dutasteride
